name: Reimu's Hatastrophic Adventure
description:
Hats have been scattered all across Gensokyo, landing on the wrong owners and combining their own funny characteristics with the hats owners funny characteristics. Of course, it's up to Reimu to fix this. By wearing the hats and combining their powers with her own, she can solve the various problems these hats have managed to cause.

Controls-

Arrow keys: Walks

Shift: Run

Z: Use hat on interactive object

A/S: Switch hat

Created for TouhouJam 6.
